pages.pageprocessor: function pageprocessorEventsDetails(pagedef,$scope, $routeParams, $compile, $http, $rootScope, $sce, $window, $location) {$scope.title = $routeParams.title;$scope.displaydate  = $routeParams.displaydate;$scope.description = $rootScope.Eventsdata[$routeParams.index].description;$scope.link = $routeParams.link;$scope.openurl = function() {window.open($scope.link, "_blank", "location=no");};var data = pagedef.pageTemplate;data = $(data).append($(pagedef.datatemplate));var data1 = $compile($(data))($scope);$("#appContent").append(data1);$scope.$apply();}
